description: Speckit workflow hooks: git validation, init state checks, task tracking, and implementation completion verification

hooks.prompt:
If this session involved '/speckit.implement' or task implementation:

Verify ALL post-implementation hooks completed:
1. Git checkpoint created before implementation
2. Task statuses updated in *-tasks.md with evidence
3. Acceptance criteria verified (checkboxes marked)
4. project-status.md updated with current metrics and checkpoint tag
5. Completion summary output to user
6. Next steps clearly stated (including revert option if issues)

If ANY post-hook is incomplete:
- Return {"ok": false, "message": "Post-implementation hooks incomplete. Update [specific missing item] before ending."}

If no implementation occurred OR all hooks complete:
- Return {"ok": true}
